alert.note: Alert for Northwest Pinal County; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 11:29PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 1215 AM MST... At 1129 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bapchule, or near Sun Lakes. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chandler, Casa Grande, Sun Lakes, Bapchule, Tumbleweed Park, Olberg, Santan and Sacaton. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 166 and 181. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 152 and 164. AZ Route 347 between mile markers 176 and 184. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Phoenix.

area.areaDesc: Northwest Pinal County; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek
